definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
party in a contract, treaty etc

sentences.english: Chapter III discusses the legal foundations of fault liability in conclusion contract.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，締約過失責任的法律基礎。

sentences.english: China is a contracting party to the International Convention on the Harmonised Commodity Description and Coding System.
sentences.chinese: 我國是《商品名稱和編碼的協調製度公約》締約國。

sentences.english: States Parties shall render appropriate assistance to persons with disabilities in the performance of their child-rearing responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 締約國應當適當協助殘疾人履行其養育子女的責任。

sentences.english: Completion is expected by Jan. 2010. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
sentences.chinese: 位於華盛頓的海軍海洋系統司令部是活動的締約方。

sentences.english: The term "territory" designates the land territory and territorial waters of each of the Contracting Parties.
sentences.chinese: “領土”一詞係指締約任何一方的領陸和領水。

sentences.english: Such decision shall be final and binding on the Parties.
sentences.chinese: 該裁判屬終局裁判，對締約雙方均有拘束力。

sentences.english: This paper first discusses the basic theory of "Culpa In Contrahendo" liability system.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先論述了締約過失責任的一般基本理論問題。

sentences.english: The system of infants?capacity of parties originates from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 未成年人締約能力制度可以追溯到羅馬法。

sentences.english: The liability of culpa in contrahendo is essentially a special form of obligation.
sentences.chinese: 締約過失責任本質上是一種特殊的侵權責任形式。

sentences.english: No Office of a Contracting Party may, for the purposes of effecting the renewal, examine the registration as to substance.
sentences.chinese: 任何締約方不得爲實施續展而就註冊進行實質審查。

sentences.english: The session was attended by 137 Parties to the Convention.
sentences.chinese: 137個公約締約方派代表出席了會議。

sentences.english: It shall be subject to ratification or acceptance by the signatory States.
sentences.chinese: 公約失效須經各締約國的批准或接受。

sentences.english: The signatories also agreed to an unprecedented 10-year holiday in the construction of new capital ships.
sentences.chinese: 締約國還同意在今後十年內不建造新的主力艦。

sentences.english: Any Contracting Party may denounce this Treaty by notification addressed to the Director General.
sentences.chinese: 任何締約方均可退出本條約，退約應通知總幹事。

sentences.english: The Naval Inventory Control Point is the contracting activity.
sentences.chinese: 海軍庫存控制點是該合同的締約方。

sentences.english: These time-limited recommendations are made available to States and, subsequently, made public.
sentences.chinese: 上述有時間限定的建議應通報締約國，然後予以公開。

definition: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Qi4 hou4 Bian4 hua4 Kuang4 jia4 Gong1 yue1
related.word: 聯合國氣候變化框架公約

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]

definition: signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
